message: I'm feeling generous, but I'm sure you understand this is a big chunk of money. Let's be reasonable.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bigger share for taking on the risk of negotiation
I'm willing to split the difference from your last offer.  Let's get this done before the value of our money goes down any further.
I'm not getting any younger, let's make a deal before the money becomes worthless
